SELECT p.id AS partId, p.name AS partName, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN sh.action_type = 'IN' THEN sh.quantity ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalIn,
COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN sh.action_type = 'OUT' THEN sh.quantity ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalOut
FROM part p LEFT JOIN stock_history_part sh ON sh.part_id = p.id AND sh.action_at BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
GROUP BY p.id, p.name ORDER BY p.id
